thread.title: How the Flu Can Turn Deadly: Q&A

author: Sarah Toy
title: How the Flu Can Turn Deadly: Q&A
text:
How dangerous is the flu?
Most people who get the flu recover from their fever, body aches and other symptoms within several days. But the flu can also lead to life-threatening complications, including pneumonia, sepsis—a bloodstream infection—and even encephalitis.
